outcome: The discovery of an encrypted map linking external espionage to internal sabotage.

events.description: A security breach reveals an encrypted digital map stored in Council archives that hints at coordinated espionage.
Analysis of the map suggests collaboration between a former Council member and foreign actors.
Media agencies receive anonymous tips about substantial ties between espionage networks and Stenograd's governance.
Public demand explanations as leaks link high-profile Council members to espionage and sabotage.
